snippet: Rengan Rajaratnam, the younger brother of imprisoned hedge fund manager Raj Rajaratnam, on Friday lost a bid to dismiss some of the insider trading charges he is facing.
abstract: Rengan Rajaratnam, younger brother of imprisoned hedge fund manager and Galleon Group founder Raj Rajaratnam, loses bid to dismiss some of insider trading charges he is facing.
lead_paragraph: Rengan Rajaratnam, the younger brother of imprisoned hedge fund manager Raj Rajaratnam, on Friday lost a bid to dismiss some of the insider trading charges he is facing.

headline.main: Charges Upheld in Another Galleon Trading Case
headline.print_headline: Charges Upheld in Another Galleon Trading Case
